name: Nightfall
message: It's okay to fall, just always get back up.

name: camiedex
message: Some chapters must close to open new ones and this new one brings better drifting and better opportunities.

name: LilJohn
message:
"I believe that God works all things for good. Even in difficult times, He is working in ways beyond what we can see, using those challenges to accomplish greater things through you than you could ever imagine."
I know you might not believe in God, and you don't have to add this if you don't want. I still think the message is true and can be applied either way.
I am praying for you.
